event.doc_name: Third Amended Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
Third Amended Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

evidence.text: the Challenged Congressional Districts violate the Fourteenth and Fifteenth Amendments of the U.S. Constitution and must be enjoined.
evidence.source_document: Third Amended Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

evidence.text: THIRD AMENDED COMPLAINT FOR INJUNCTIVE AND DECLARATORY RELIEF
evidence.source_document: Third Amended Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

event.doc_name: Third Amended Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

evidence.text: i. Declare the Challenged Congressional Districts adopted in S. 865 to be unconstitutional as violating the Fourteenth Amendment of the U.S. Constitution as racially gerrymandered districts;
evidence.source_document: Third Amended Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Declare the Challenged Congressional Districts adopted in S. 865 to be unconstitutional as violating the Fourteenth Amendment of the U.S. Constitution as racially gerrymandered districts

evidence.text: ii. Declare the Challenged Congressional Districts adopted in S. 865 to be unconstitutional as violating the Fourteenth and Fifteenth Amendments of the U.S. Constitution as passed with discriminatory intent as a motivating factor;
evidence.source_document: Third Amended Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Declare the Challenged Congressional Districts adopted in S. 865 to be unconstitutional as violating the Fourteenth and Fifteenth Amendments of the U.S. Constitution as passed with discriminatory intent as a motivating factor

evidence.text: iii. Preliminary and permanently enjoin Defendants and their agents from calling, holding, supervising or certifying any elections under S. 865 until a constitutionally and VRA-complaint remedial plan is adopted for the 2024 elections or any special election in 2023;
evidence.source_document: Third Amended Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Preliminary and permanently enjoin Defendants and their agents from calling, holding, supervising or certifying any elections under S. 865 until a constitutionally and VRA-complaint remedial plan is adopted for the 2024 elections or any special election in 2023

evidence.text: iv. Order expedited hearings and briefing, consider evidence, and take any other action necessary for the Court to order a VRA-complaint for new South Carolina Congressional districts;
evidence.source_document: Third Amended Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Order expedited hearings and briefing, consider evidence, and take any other action necessary for the Court to order a VRA-complaint for new South Carolina Congressional districts

evidence.text: v. Set an immediate and reasonable deadline for Defendants to adopt and enact a congressional redistricting plan that (1) does not dilute, cancel out, or minimize the voting strength of Black South Carolinian voters or subject them to intentionally discriminatory districts, and (2) does not violate the VRA, federal and state constitutions, and other applicable law;
evidence.source_document: Third Amended Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Set an immediate and reasonable deadline for Defendants to adopt and enact a congressional redistricting plan that (1) does not dilute, cancel out, or minimize the voting strength of Black South Carolinian voters or subject them to intentionally discriminatory districts, and (2) does not violate the VRA, federal and state constitutions, and other applicable law

evidence.text: vi. Order new redistricting maps if Defendants fail to adopt maps that conforms with this Court's judgment;
evidence.source_document: Third Amended Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Order new redistricting maps if Defendants fail to adopt maps that conforms with this Court's judgment

evidence.text: vii. Order changes to any relevant election-related deadlines to allow the adoption of congressional and state legislative maps that conform with this Court's judgment;
evidence.source_document: Third Amended Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Order changes to any relevant election-related deadlines to allow the adoption of congressional and state legislative maps that conform with this Court's judgment

evidence.text: viii. Retain jurisdiction over this matter until Defendants enact compliant maps by this Court's deadline;
evidence.source_document: Third Amended Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Retain jurisdiction over this matter until Defendants enact compliant maps by this Court's deadline

evidence.text: ix. Retain jurisdiction over this matter for such a period it deems appropriate and require Defendants to submit future congressional and state legislative redistricting plans for preclearance review from this court or the U.S. Attorney General under Section 3(c) of the VRA, 52 U.S.C. § 10302(c);
evidence.source_document: Third Amended Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Retain jurisdiction over this matter for such a period it deems appropriate and require Defendants to submit future congressional and state legislative redistricting plans for preclearance review from this court or the U.S. Attorney General under Section 3(c) of the VRA, 52 U.S.C. § 10302(c)

evidence.text: x. Award Plaintiffs' attorneys' fees and costs in this action;
evidence.source_document: Third Amended Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Award Plaintiffs' attorneys' fees and costs in this action

evidence.text: xi. Grant such other and further relief as this Court deems just and proper in the circumstances.
evidence.source_document: Third Amended Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Grant such other and further relief as this Court deems just and proper in the circumstances

args.reason: All 13 distinct remedy requests from the Third Amended Complaint (Plaintiff's primary pleading) have been extracted. No other documents contain additional distinct remedy requests meeting the checklist criteria (defendant requests or additional plaintiff remedies). The remaining documents are either court orders (not requested remedies), settlement agreements (not court-ordered remedies), or unvisited documents unlikely to contain new remedy requests.

All 13 distinct remedy requests from the plaintiff's Third Amended Complaint have been extracted. No other documents contain additional distinct remedy requests meeting the criteria. Defendant remedy requests were not present in the corpus. Checklist is fully populated with evidence-based entries.
